channel.title: Question about bypassing timed router shutdown
channel.description: Hello, I have a question about how I can bypass the fact that the router where I am staying shuts off on a timed basis (from 23:00 to 05:00.) I cannot pentest due to my lack of a monitor mode card. Is there a way to get around this? Or a way to create an extra access point to bypass this? Any advice would be greatly appreciated. Thank you in advance.

item.title: Question about bypassing timed router shutdown
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Question about bypassing timed router shutdown

item.title: Question about bypassing timed router shutdown
item.dc:creator: Pingas_McPingasface
item.description:
Hello, I have a question about how I can bypass the fact that the router where I am staying shuts off on a timed basis (from 23:00 to 05:00.) I cannot pentest due to my lack of a monitor mode card. Is there a way to get around this? Or a way to create an extra access point to bypass this? Any advice would be greatly appreciated. Thank you in advance.
